member.summary: Indicates if invoice should be committed as soon as it is processed. Default: false.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.Invoice.Lifeline
member.summary: Indicates if customer is a Lifeline participant. Default: false.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.Invoice.InvoiceMode
member.summary: Indicates if all line items within invoice should be processed in invoice mode. Default: true.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.Invoice.ReturnDetail
member.summary: Indicates if individual line item taxes should be included in response. Default: true.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.Invoice.ReturnSummary
member.summary: Indicates if the summarized taxes for the invoice should be included in the resonse. Default: false.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.Invoice.OptionalFields
member.summary: Optional values for invoice. Maximum of 5. Keys must be numeric from 1 to 5.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.Invoice.CurrencyCode
member.summary: Currency code for invoice. Example: CAD = Canadian Dollar

member.summary: Individual tax calculation results for each line item.

member.name: T:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.LineItem
member.summary: Data for an invoice or quote line item.

member.name: F:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.LineItem.MAX_LINETEM_STRING
member.summary: Maximum length of a LineItem string.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.LineItem.From
member.summary: Location for origination point. If null, will default to Invoice's BillTo location.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.LineItem.To
member.summary: Location for destination point. If null, will default to Invoice's BillTo location.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.LineItem.SaleType
member.summary: 0 - Wholesale : Indicates that the item was sold to a wholeseller. 1 - Retail : Indicates that the item was sold to an end user - a retail sale. 2 - Consumed : Indicates that the item was consumed directly (SAU products only). 3 - VendorUse : Indicates that the item is subject to vendor use tax (SAU products only).

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.LineItem.TaxInclusive
member.summary: Indicates if the charge for this line item is tax-inclusive.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.LineItem.ProRatedPct
member.summary: For pro-rated tax calculations. Percentage to pro-rate.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.LineItem.ProRatedAdjType
member.summary: For pro-rated credit or adjustment calculations. 0 = default 1 = do not return non-proratable fixed taxes in response 2 = return non-proratable fixed taxes in response

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.LineItem.Debit
member.summary: Indicates if this line item is a debit card transaction. Default: false.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.LineItem.IsAdjustment
member.summary: Indicates if this line item is an adjustment. Default: false.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.LineItem.OptionalFields
member.summary: Optional values for line item. Maximum of 5. Keys must be numeric from 5 to 10.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.LineItem.AttributeProperty
member.summary: Attribute/property value for sales and use transaction/service pairs.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.LineItem.Lifeline
member.summary: Indicates if customer is a Lifeline participant. Default: false.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.LineItem.Quantity
member.summary: Quantity to be applied to the item - taxation is equivalent to repeating the item the number of times of the quantity

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.LineItem.GeneralLedgerRef
member.summary: General Ledger reference to be used in reporting

member.summary: Tax calculation results for a single line item.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.SetTaxConfigBaseRequest.ProfileConfigId
member.summary: Profile configuration id to be used when updating an existing profile Use null for new configuration

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.SetTaxConfigBaseRequest.LinkProfileIds
member.summary: Profile(s) to be added to configuration Leave null to not change profiles associated with configuration settings

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.SetTaxConfigBaseRequest.UnlinkProfileIds
member.summary: Profile(s) to be added to configuration Leave null to not change profiles associated with configuration settings

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.SetTaxConfigBaseRequest.ClientId
member.summary: Client id associated with configuration Will use default id for user if null

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.SetTaxConfigBaseRequest.Deactivate
member.summary: True = Deactivate the configuration Requires ProfileConfigId to be provided and valid. Automatically removes any profile mappings associated with the configuration.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.SetTaxConfigBaseRequest.Description
member.summary: Description to be applied to requested configuration

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.SetTaxConfigBaseRequest.ReplaceExistingLinks
member.summary: Flag indicating existing configuration links to profile should be replaced This only applies when one or more profiles have been specified to be linked. - If true, mapping conflicts will be resolved by removing other links. - If false, mapping conflicts will cause the request to fail with an error returned.

member.name: T:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.Tax
member.summary: Tax data for individual line item.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.Tax.Billable
member.summary: Indicates if tax is billable to customer.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.Tax.Compliance
member.summary: Indicates if the tax is to be reported to jurisdiction.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxBase.TaxingPCode
member.summary: PCode for taxing jurisdiction. Only returned if return extended tax data flag is true

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxBase.Surcharge
member.summary: Indicates if this tax is a surcharge.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxBase.UserExempt
member.summary: Flag indicating if tax was user exempted Only returned if return extended tax data flag is true

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxBase.NoTaxItem
member.summary: Flag indicating the item is a no tax entry There were no taxes generated, this entry is to convey back the taxing jurisdiction that was used in the response Only returned if return extended tax data flag is true

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxBase.TransactionType
member.summary: Transaction type used to calculate tax For bundles will be specific bundled item transaction type Only returned if return extended tax data flag is true

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxBase.ServiceType
member.summary: Service type used to calculate tax For bundles will be specific bundled item service type Only returned if return extended tax data flag is true

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxBase.TransactionCharge
member.summary: Charge used to calculate tax For bundles will be the percentage of charge applied to bundled item For tax inclusive calls will be the calculated charge Only returned if return extended tax data flag is true

member.name: T:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxBracket
member.summary: Rate information for a tax bracket.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxBracket.Rate
member.summary: Tax rate. Value cannot be negative. For rated taxes, value must be from 0 to 1. Otherwise, value may be larger.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxBracket.MaxBase
member.summary: Maximum base that this rate applies to.

member.summary: Choice of algorithms for Tax-On-Tax calculations

member.summary: Tax-on-tax is calculated in a single pass.

member.name: F:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxOnTaxAlgorithms.IterateOnTaxAmount
member.summary: Tax-on-tax iterates until the difference in the tax-on-tax calculated tax amount is less than 0.005

member.summary: Tax-on-tax iterates until the difference in the tax-on-tax calculated taxable measure is less than 0.005

member.summary: Choice of algorithms for Self-Tax calculations

member.summary: All self-tax taxes for calculation are calculated as an aggregate

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxConfigurationSettings.ReturnNonBillable

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxExemption.Force
member.summary: Override level exempt flag on wildcard tax type exemptions.
member.remarks: True (Default) - Tax type wildcard exemptions will exempt taxes tagged not level exemptible False - Tax type wildcard exemptions will exclude taxes tagged not level exemptible from consideration

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxExemption.Location
member.remarks: Match occurs at level specified by domain setting.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxExemption.TaxType
member.summary: Tax type to exempt. Tax type exemptions and Category exemptions are mutually exclusive.
member.remarks: 0 Indicates wildcard - exempts all tax types

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxExemption.TaxLevel
member.remarks: Obsolete - provided for legacy support. Use Domain and Scope instead.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxExemption.TaxCategory
member.summary: Tax category to exempt. Tax type exemptions and Category exemptions are mutually exclusive.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxExemption.Domain
member.summary: Exemption Domain. This is the jurisdiction level in which the exemption jurisdiction must match the taxing jurisdiction.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxExemption.Scope
member.summary: Exemption Scope. This defines the tax levels in which the taxes will be considered as candidates for exemption.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxExemption.ExemptNonbillable
member.summary: Exempt non-billable flag. Determines if non-billable taxes are to be considered as candidates for exemption.
member.remarks: True - nonbillable taxes can be exempted False (Default)- nonbillable taxes will not be exempted

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxOverride.Location
member.summary: Jurisdiction PCode for this tax rate override.

member.name: P:Avalara.CommsPlatform.Api.Models.TaxOverride.Scope
member.summary: Scope for override. 0 = Country, 1 = State, 2 = County, 3 = City.
